messages.content: Will Forster and the Lib Dems: Fighting to stop Brexit and building a brighter future.
Will Forster has the passion and experience to really fight for Woking Constituency as our next local MP.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Will do his best to stop Brexit and focus on local priorities.
Wants to see investment in the NHS and schools.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Conservative Government doesn't care about ordinary people. They're pushing ahead with their damaging Brexit.

community.content: Will worked closely with local charities, including the homeless shelter and York Road Project.

leaflet.personalStatement: Will Forster has the passion and experience to really fight for Woking Constituency as our next local MP. He has spent much of his life fighting to help people in Woking.

politicalExperience.role: Former Mayor of Woking and Councillor for the Woking area
politicalExperience.achievements: Has a record of standing up for his community.

examples: Woking didn't vote for Brexit in the 2016 referendum and we don't want it now.
This Conservative Government doesn't care about ordinary people.
We all know that this Conservative Government doesn't care about ordinary people.
Will Forster has the passion and experience to really fight for Woking Constituency as our next local MP.
Investment in the NHS and schools.
Fighting to help people in Woking.
This Conservative Government doesn't care about ordinary people.

personalStories.story: Will has spent much of his life fighting to help people in Woking, particularly homeless people. Will worked closely with local charities, including the homeless shelter and York Road Project.

examples: This Conservative Government doesn't care about ordinary people.
If Boris Johnson’s Tories get their way on Brexit there’ll be less money to fund our NHS…

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: Grew up in Goldsworth Park and Horsell. Attended Horsell C of E School, Woking High School and Woking College.
nonPolicyAttributes.family: Lives in Fairview Avenue by Woking Park with his partner Hannah and their dog Toffee.

examples: Grew up in Goldsworth Park and Horsell.
